hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa’eed Al-Khudri said:“We bought a ram for sacrifice, then a wolf tore some flesh from its rump and ears. We asked the Prophet (ﷺ) and he told us to offer it as a sacrifice.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اشْتَرَى أُضْحِيَّةً صَحِيحَةً فَأَصَابَهَا عِنْدَهُ شَىْءٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who buys a sound, healthy animal then something happens to it while it is in his care
